title: Jay’s Transport
whereToGo: Where would you like to go
introDescription: Jay’s Transport is the leading provider of private chauffeur (VTC) and motorcycle taxi services in Paris and the Île-de-France region.
fullRangeDescription: We offer a full range of services and impeccable quality transportation. As leader in private chauffeur transport in Essonne (91), we have established partnerships with drivers across the Paris region to expand our services, including sedan rides, van transfers, and motorcycle taxis.
vtcTaxiServices: Our VTC Services with Private Driver and Motorcycle Taxi
bookingAllTrips: You can book our private chauffeur VTCs or motorcycle taxis for all types of trips—whether personal, professional, or recreational
pickupAnywhere: We can pick you up from your home, workplace, the airport, or the train station, and take you wherever you need to go
regularTrips: We regularly accompany our clients to the main tourist and leisure destinations in the region.
comfortSecure: Our transport services are complemented by a wide range of additional amenities to ensure a journey that is both comfortable and safe.
shuttleExperience: Our drivers are experienced with trips to and from airports and train stations in the Paris region. As such, we are able to cover a wide service area, including:
stationTrips: Shuttles and rides to and from train stations throughout the Île-de-France region. Our VTCs and motorcycle taxis can pick you up from or drop you off at major stations such as Gare du Nord, Gare de l’Est in Paris, or the Paris-Gallieni international bus station.
airportTrips: Shuttles and rides to and from Paris airports: Roissy–Charles de Gaulle, Orly, Le Bourget, and more.
extendedBooking: For your personal or professional travel, you also have the option to book your VTC or motorcycle taxi for an extended period of time.
flexibleService: We offer flexible services and tailored solutions to meet your transportation needs. Our drivers can accompany you throughout the day—whether it’s for professional appointments at multiple locations, a sightseeing tour, or private trips.
dayUse: Whether you're visiting tourist attractions or planning a shopping day, our drivers are at your service.
customPricing: Let us know your needs when booking, and we’ll adjust the pricing based on the duration of the service.
mototaxiUsage: MotoTaxis are especially popular for short but urgent trips, such as getting to a business meeting, heading to an airport or train station, or traveling in the evening when public transport is less available. They are also a preferred choice for tourists who want to explore the city quickly while avoiding traffic jams.
mototaxiCustom: We offer tailor-made MotoTaxi services, customized to each client's specific needs. Whether for regular or occasional rides, MotoTaxis can be booked in advance for specific times or even for extended durations (e.g., full-day sightseeing tours or multiple professional appointments).
mototaxiSafety: MotoTaxi companies also place a strong emphasis on safety, with experienced drivers and well-maintained motorcycles to ensure a high-quality transport experience while minimizing risks.
vtcIntro: VTCs (Private Hire Vehicles with Driver) have become a preferred transport solution for many passengers, offering a more personalized and comfortable alternative to traditional taxis.
individualServiceArea: We offer transportation services for individuals in Paris and the Île-de-France region.
availableFor: We are available to assist with:
stationAirportTransfers: ransfers from train stations or airports,
workplaceTravel: Transportation to your workplace or meeting location
proTripBenefits: For your business travel, choosing a private chauffeur is the ideal solution—it allows you to reach your destination quickly while easily carrying your professional equipment (laptop, briefcase, etc.).
easyBooking: Simply make a reservation by specifying your needs—routes, timings, and more—to benefit from Jay’s Transport services.
dayRental: We offer vehicle hire with a private chauffeur for a full day or an entire weekend, depending on your needs. Whether it's for a business trip, a special event, or a getaway, our cars are available to accompany you throughout the desired period, with a dedicated private driver at your service. Contact us today to receive a personalized quote.
callAt: Call us at +33 (0)6 84 40 61 26, available from Monday to Sunday, including public holidays.
noteTxt: A fixed-rate price will be sent to you by email or SMS for your VTC or motorcycle taxi ride.
contactme: You can contact me at Email
